Articles.Content:
I need some help with making a star system. I would like to know how to make a blue star with a couple of planets with some moons, I would like to know how to make gas gaints (using PF:CE?) and

I might also need some help with getting my SpaceEngine exports on a planet. Last but not least, (I know I'm asking for a lot of help here) I need to know how to make atmospheric layers using EVE V7.4 for my custom-made planets...

Maybe I can just use the cloud textures that can be exported using SpaceEngine?

It's a shame that there are no good in depth tutorials regarding Planet Factory CE, I keep looking for tutorials but none seem to help me.

Everytime I find a tutorial it's just a person copying the .cfg files that are already in the PF:CE folders and then editing the main orbital features, but no actual explanation as to what the lines mean.

TL;DR I need some help making a new blue star system with gas giants.
